MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software titles. To find out more go to http://pad.asp-software.org

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Initial Windows release of ByteAgent desktop application with 64+ professional tools and natural language interface

Expire_Info.Expire_Other_Info: Free trial includes 100 requests per month

English.Keywords: AI assistant, Windows, desktop automation, natural language, system tools, network analysis, security, file operations, ChatGPT, artificial intelligence, productivity, Windows 10, Windows 11
English.Char_Desc_45: AI assistant for Windows using natural language
English.Char_Desc_80: Natural language AI desktop assistant for Windows - no technical skills needed
English.Char_Desc_250: ByteAgent for Windows is an AI assistant that anyone can use with simple, natural language commands. No technical knowledge required! Just ask it to do Windows tasks like "find my large files" or "check my system performance" and it handles everything automatically.
English.Char_Desc_450: ByteAgent revolutionizes Windows computer interaction through natural language. Simply tell it what you want - "clean up my disk space", "check my network speed", "find duplicate files" - and ByteAgent executes complex Windows tasks automatically. Perfect for everyone from complete beginners to IT professionals. No PowerShell or command prompt knowledge needed!
English.Char_Desc_2000:
ByteAgent for Windows is a revolutionary AI desktop assistant that makes Windows computer tasks accessible to everyone through natural language conversation. Whether you're a complete beginner or an IT professional, ByteAgent understands what you want and executes complex Windows operations automatically.
Simply tell ByteAgent what you need: • "Find all my large files taking up disk space" • "Test my internet connection and WiFi speed" • "Check what programs are slowing down my computer" • "Analyze this document or spreadsheet for me" • "Find security issues on my Windows system" • "Monitor my computer's CPU and memory usage" • "Clean up temporary files and optimize performance"
No Technical Knowledge Required: ByteAgent translates your everyday language into sophisticated Windows operations. You don't need to learn PowerShell, Command Prompt, or Windows administration - just speak naturally!
64+ Professional Windows Tools Built-In: • File Management: Find, organize, and analyze files using Windows APIs • Network Analysis: Test connections, check speeds, diagnose WiFi problems • Security Auditing: Scan for vulnerabilities, check Windows security settings • System Monitoring: Track performance, memory, CPU usage with Windows tools • Registry Analysis: Safe registry operations without manual editing • Process Management: Monitor and analyze running programs • Disk Optimization: Clean temporary files, find duplicates, manage storage
Perfect For All Windows Users: • Home Users: Maintain your Windows PC easily without technical knowledge • Students: Organize files, documents, and optimize study computers • Small Business Owners: Monitor Windows systems without IT staff • Remote Workers: Keep work computers running smoothly • IT Professionals: Advanced Windows tools with simple natural language commands
Windows-Optimized Features: • Native Windows integration with proper file associations • Windows 10 & 11 compatibility with modern UI guidelines • PowerShell integration behind the scenes (hidden from users) • Windows-specific tools for registry, services, and system management • Secure Windows workspace isolation using Windows security features
Secure & Private: All operations run locally on your Windows computer in isolated workspaces. Your data never leaves your machine. Uses Windows built-in security features.
Proprietary Software - All Rights Reserved Professional Windows software with ongoing updates and support.
